channel.title: CVE Feed for Arista Networks -- EOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Arista Networks -- EOS

item.title: CVE-2021-28505|2024-09-16T16:58:06.559Z -- arista%20networks -- eos
item.description: On affected Arista EOS platforms, if a VXLAN match rule exists in an IPv4 access-list that is applied to the ingress of an L2 or an L3 port/SVI, the VXLAN rule and subsequent ACL rules in that access list will ignore the specified IP protocol.
